methods.name: getBrightness
javadoc: Gets how bright this entity is.

methods.name: getInertia
javadoc: Return the motion factor for this projectile. The factor is multiplied by the original motion.

methods.name: hurt
javadoc: Called when the entity is attacked.

methods.name: isPickable
javadoc: Returns true if other Entities should be prevented from moving through this Entity.

methods.name: readAdditionalSaveData
javadoc: (abstract) Protected helper method to read subclass entity data from NBT.

methods.name: shouldRenderAtSqrDistance
javadoc: Checks if the entity is in range to render.

methods.name: tick
javadoc: Called to update the entity's position/logic.
